data.fullContent: I designed a website for my friend's company, a site that she made available exclusively to her clients. I used the principles of design for the web page, including contrast, balance, harmony, space, and emphasis. I felt that using these principles would help my friend stand out from her competitors and help to showcase her work. I started by creating a header that had an image of several people laughing in a park to represent fun and friendship. I chose yellow as a principal color to signify cheerfulness. I used white text on a medium gray background to make the content readable. I also decided to make my design simple so that it would appeal to the audience's attention span.

q1.translation: 我为我朋友的公司设计了一个网站，这个网站只对她的客户开放。我使用了网页设计的原则，包括对比、平衡、和谐、空间和强调。我觉得使用这些原则可以帮助我的朋友从她的竞争对手中脱颖而出，并有助于展示她的作品。我首先创建了一个头部，有几个人在公园里笑的图像，代表乐趣和友谊。我选择黄色作为主要颜色以表示愉快。

options.sentence: I used the principles of design, such as space and balance, to create a webpage for my friend's business.
I think that a website should be easy to read and contain information that is valuable, interesting, and updated frequently.
The main part of my friend's website is the content, so I make sure that every part of the site has something to offer.
The second step in designing a website is to find out what the audience wants, then use that information in designing the site for them.
